title: JELLO Font
content:
Hey guys,  
I know I can always trust you font experts. I'm having a hard time exactly IDing the JELLO font. I can find some pretty similar fonts, but nothing exactly right.

JELLO example here: [http://www.khmerkromrecipes.com/photo\_recipes/rasp\_jello.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125013510/http:/www.khmerkromrecipes.com/photo_recipes/rasp_jello.jpg "http://www.khmerkromrecipes.com/photo\_recipes/rasp\_jello.jpg")

Thanks Guys!
author: swtboyazn

comments.content: Because JELL-O is a brand it was probably hand drawn in an effort to keep it unique. [Avant Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125013510/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=C.1531.0.5&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=JELL-O&sampleSize=48) will get you close.
